name: RobCo Network
description: RobCo Network is a decentralized robotics ecosystem built on Ethereum that transforms 3D printers and robots into income-generating Real World Assets (RWAs). By connecting devices through the RobCo DeviceKit hardware module and blockchain smart contracts, the network enables a global, on-chain marketplace for manufacturing. Operators can stake tokens and earn by completing verified jobs, while customers access a trustless system for ordering production with cryptographic quality assurance. The platform combines hardware integration, AI-driven quality control, and Ethereum-based payments to create a decentralized manufacturing economy.
